SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="01918bdaeefe424e8e118472330613ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well, hello there, new blood.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It'll be nice to
have a fresh subject around here, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]eheheh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01918bdaeefe424e8e118472330613ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Since we'll be working together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can
just call me [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01918bdaeefe424e8e118472330613ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you come across any of those leaflings
that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] saw,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] bring them to me, and I'll
find out what makes them tick.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_SelfAndNightUnl:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4a477a59162a4517986c330e23240603" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Well, hello there, new blood.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It'll be nice to
have a fresh subject around here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4a477a59162a4517986c330e23240603" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Since we'll be working together,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can
just call me [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4a477a59162a4517986c330e23240603" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]No sense wasting valuable research
time.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need you to go out on some night
expeditions for me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4a477a59162a4517986c330e23240603" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I want you to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]harvest extracts[System:Color name="Default"] from the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lumiknolls [System:Color name="Default"]that I can use as medicinal
ingredients. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]It's only possible at night.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4a477a59162a4517986c330e23240603" Scale="1"/]I could go on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but you should just see it
for yourself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let me know when you're
ready for a nighttime adventure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_NightUnlocked_0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="167d77d958404b8e8d9e6e181490d283" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Well, hey there, new blood.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="167d77d958404b8e8d9e6e181490d283" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]No sense wasting valuable research
time.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I need you to go out on some night
expeditions for me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="167d77d958404b8e8d9e6e181490d283" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I want you to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]harvest extracts[System:Color name="Default"] from the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Lumiknolls [System:Color name="Default"]that I can use as medicinal
ingredients. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]It's only possible at night.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="167d77d958404b8e8d9e6e181490d283" Scale="1"/]I could go on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but you should just see it
for yourself.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let me know when you're
ready for a nighttime adventure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e7cf75fb8f6b400abd8763e02a22a5fa" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Hey, new blood.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If you have any injuries
or diseases slowing you down,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can help.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e7cf75fb8f6b400abd8763e02a22a5fa" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Also, if you find any of those leaflings that
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] saw,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] send them to me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll give them a
free checkup...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]for science.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="49212094da7e482a8ae04aa5379b5bb7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you dig right into the night expeditions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
you're sure to have some luck.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="befcafaefeca4025a35b9432d2c39349" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Need me for something, new blood?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're
not feeling unwell,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e14b1ec777dc43458557b4079b29afe7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The leaflings are just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]wow.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The more I
examine them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the more fascinating
they become!
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="fff89a2607234cfd8764d05e1896294f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]How are your night expeditions going?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Be sure to keep your guard up out there.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="3d3dd73580154bd8abc2e0a8e30f0f35" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Heyyy,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there you are.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Aren't you supposed
to be out collecting glow sap?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="2763928f5b83422797b698fdb68da688" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Eager to go out on a night expedition,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
are you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm ready when you are.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="190b23045b52429396a34ac0fc17e755" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If the medicine doesn't work on [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
that just means I get to do more research.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="cb670ad598b64558b53b1056bc7d4e8a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Night expeditions can be scary,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but isn't it
invigorating to be out there knowing you're
at a disadvantage in the darkness?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="170477d218a147a9bd18686bcb6c0db2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Need me for something, new blood?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're
not feeling unwell,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] are you?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Intro_Night_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4ead5584b142462d864a031600b564ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/][Grammar:Cap/]night expeditions can be scary,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but isn't it
invigorating to be out there knowing you're
at a disadvantage in the darkness?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6a8f103dd9ed437083417bceeecc8a36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Give me a shout whenever you feel like
going out for a night expedition.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6a8f103dd9ed437083417bceeecc8a36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s great,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but belieeeve me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you'll need
my expertise when you're out there, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]lost
in the dark, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]eheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a54293715f754f7a822b2fa3a4876ebf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Sooo,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] did you enjoy your venture out into
the dark of night?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a54293715f754f7a822b2fa3a4876ebf" Scale="1"/]The creatures at night can be somewhat
startling.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I mean,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you saw the way their
eyes turn red![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a54293715f754f7a822b2fa3a4876ebf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I feel bad for the Lumiknolls.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Must be
rough always having creatures after
them like that.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="bcbd7a4fdde344d08247d8096fc43267" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]It was [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] who drank the medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but don't be too upset with him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bcbd7a4fdde344d08247d8096fc43267" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] thinks any drink left sitting out on a
table must have been his.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bcbd7a4fdde344d08247d8096fc43267" Scale="1"/]I was testing out a new medicine aaand
just happened to leave it where he
stumbled upon it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bcbd7a4fdde344d08247d8096fc43267" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Eheheh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that can be our little secret.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="30af9bffe53c4c1fba842279bbb236e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If a Glow Pikmin gets eaten by a creature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it becomes a speck of light and vanishes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30af9bffe53c4c1fba842279bbb236e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But that doesn't mean it's dead and gone![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30af9bffe53c4c1fba842279bbb236e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That speck of light gets absorbed
by a Lumiknoll,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and it's reborn into a
Glow Pikmin again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30af9bffe53c4c1fba842279bbb236e6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]So when Glow Pikmin get eaten,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't
bother shedding a tear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh!
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="14c35389cde14883a90537db1caa7afd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Even though I'm rather intrigued by the
leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I must fight the urge to start
picking and plucking at their leaves.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="14c35389cde14883a90537db1caa7afd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Apparently,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our bushy friends use that
foliage to breathe.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e6be3d90f4be4a17bda8faf3fccbfcc1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Even though I'm rather intrigued by the
leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I must fight the urge to start
picking and plucking at their leaves.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e6be3d90f4be4a17bda8faf3fccbfcc1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Apparently,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our bushy friends use that
foliage to breathe.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="b26b3a4da18e4adebb5d8be86b160b30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We know glow sap breaks down leaves,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
it also has remarkable healing effects.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b26b3a4da18e4adebb5d8be86b160b30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Buuut if a non-leafified individual takes
the medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] those healing benefits are
virtually nonexistent.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b26b3a4da18e4adebb5d8be86b160b30" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Perhaps next time you find someone badly
injured,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I should try turning them into a
leaf person to heal them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d58179e4a8214bd19bdadb6aa9eb28a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], right?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] He's always getting
injured in the most interesting ways.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d58179e4a8214bd19bdadb6aa9eb28a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]One time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he managed to scorch his face
soot black while standing ankle-deep in a
frozen puddle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d58179e4a8214bd19bdadb6aa9eb28a2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Never a dull moment,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="321414afc5864bfdaeb855dca35ee963" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]We reeeally need you to find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that
dog who's always with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="321414afc5864bfdaeb855dca35ee963" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]We need that pup for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s cure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
so everyone is counting on you.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f071b08407c74294a461b3742370d65b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]By nightfall,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the bodies of creatures left
during the day have disappeared.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder
who or what is cleaning them up?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f071b08407c74294a461b3742370d65b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Also, the creatures attacking at night are
different somehow.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And no matter how
many you defeat,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] more keep coming.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f071b08407c74294a461b3742370d65b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We don't yet understand the world of night
on this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There are still many secrets
waiting to be uncovered...
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="11c84b979c3a4ce8a5b18e7144edc6fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It might surprise you
to learn that he's actually one of the
pickiest eaters I know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="11c84b979c3a4ce8a5b18e7144edc6fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]We even have a separate section in our
food storage just for him.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] A lot of absurdly
expensive special-order items.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="11c84b979c3a4ce8a5b18e7144edc6fe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It's a bit over the top.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as a
doctor, I believe he should eat well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sooo
I have mixed feelings on the subject.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4251050d58a043f98d5dcf18ec358ecf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Even though I'm rather intrigued by the
leaflings,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I must fight the urge to start
picking and plucking at their leaves.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4251050d58a043f98d5dcf18ec358ecf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Apparently,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our bushy friends use that
foliage to breathe.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="ffc02e79794245f4814debef8d974f44" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]That's unfortunate.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It looks as if [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]
got leafified too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ffc02e79794245f4814debef8d974f44" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]For [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s cure,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm going to need
healthy space-dog cells.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0bbd196efa45486aa793ff4b3af2ce48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]About Koppaites...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It appears they're
capable of tolerating oxygen...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]buuut
only in small quantities.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0bbd196efa45486aa793ff4b3af2ce48" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Just how small is "small" though?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder
if one would let me conduct a few
experiments...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]for posterity.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_05_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c493632dbeff48829f8290c3267ca1b9" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Do you have time to discuss glow sap?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm curious how it affects those who drink
large quantities of the substance.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c493632dbeff48829f8290c3267ca1b9" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Even someone who has no tolerance for
oxygen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like that Hocotatian,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can suddenly
tolerate the gas in small amounts.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c493632dbeff48829f8290c3267ca1b9" Scale="0.9978425"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oxygen's toxic for us too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What would a tiny portion of glow sap do
to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll just leave it out on this table...
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8cb147120fb24b139f288af40a62a838" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Now we can finally go home whenever we
want to.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8cb147120fb24b139f288af40a62a838" Scale="1"/]Although,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd reaaally like to stay here a
little longer.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] There's still so much research
to be done!
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e4a8797f46ea4467bf3af5540ce806d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] looking at its genetic makeup,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it
seems as if the Ancient Sirehound could
be the ancestor of the space dog.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e4a8797f46ea4467bf3af5540ce806d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Over many generations,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] they got smaller
and smaller until they reached the size of
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e4a8797f46ea4467bf3af5540ce806d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Just how old is that Ancient Sirehound,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I wonder?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wish it could tell me its secret
to long life,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d28ba3debf604f22af073f37ca90d9ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I wish I could bring a Lumiknoll back with
us,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] buuut [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal05"/]François[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] from the research
task force insists it can't be done.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d28ba3debf604f22af073f37ca90d9ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Imagine all the fascinating things I could
do if I could mass-produce more medicine!
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="bd96eac162534a95b1181b9ef01a3225" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If a Glow Pikmin gets eaten by a creature,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it becomes a speck of light and vanishes.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bd96eac162534a95b1181b9ef01a3225" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But that doesn't mean it's dead and gone![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bd96eac162534a95b1181b9ef01a3225" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]That speck of light gets absorbed
by a Lumiknoll,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and it's reborn into a
Glow Pikmin again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bd96eac162534a95b1181b9ef01a3225" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]So when Glow Pikmin get eaten,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] don't
bother shedding a tear,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh!
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0d1b9b5ce7fc46fc9826b01170947d76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]We know glow sap breaks down leaves,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and
it also has remarkable healing effects.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d1b9b5ce7fc46fc9826b01170947d76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Buuut if a non-leafified individual takes
the medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] those healing benefits are
virtually nonexistent.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0d1b9b5ce7fc46fc9826b01170947d76" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Perhaps next time you find someone badly
injured,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I should try turning them into a
leaf person to heal them,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="ec026b1aeb1d4a999c7cf134d144bf90" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], right?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] He's always getting
injured in the most interesting ways.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ec026b1aeb1d4a999c7cf134d144bf90" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]One time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he managed to scorch his face
soot black while standing ankle-deep in a
frozen puddle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ec026b1aeb1d4a999c7cf134d144bf90" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Never a dull moment,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="41f08a4d89054b48853c2a6d4f48419d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]By nightfall,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the bodies of creatures left
during the day have disappeared.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder
who or what is cleaning them up?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41f08a4d89054b48853c2a6d4f48419d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Also, the creatures attacking at night are
different somehow.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] And no matter how
many you defeat,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] more keep coming.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="41f08a4d89054b48853c2a6d4f48419d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]We don't yet understand the world of night
on this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There are still many secrets
waiting to be uncovered...
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="01e4b3fa0ca04c378a6d7672631bcdee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It might surprise you
to learn that he's actually one of the
pickiest eaters I know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01e4b3fa0ca04c378a6d7672631bcdee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]We even have a separate section in our
food storage just for him.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] A lot of absurdly
expensive special-order items.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01e4b3fa0ca04c378a6d7672631bcdee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]It's a bit over the top.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as a
doctor, I believe he should eat well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sooo
I have mixed feelings on the subject.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="104f39ec4f024c33a1e0931ea5e11818" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]About Koppaites...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It appears they're
capable of tolerating oxygen...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]buuut
only in small quantities.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="104f39ec4f024c33a1e0931ea5e11818" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Just how small is "small" though?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I wonder
if one would let me conduct a few
experiments...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]for posterity.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Hint_06_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="3d79ee835aa14473a61146edd09e4c1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Do you have time to discuss glow sap?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm curious how it affects those who drink
large quantities of the substance.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3d79ee835aa14473a61146edd09e4c1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Even someone who has no tolerance for
oxygen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like that Hocotatian,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] can suddenly
tolerate the gas in small amounts.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3d79ee835aa14473a61146edd09e4c1b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Oxygen's toxic for us too,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What would a tiny portion of glow sap do
to Dingo?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll just leave it out on this table...
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Continue_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c40fa729a9d1429ab278fdf75031e31c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you want to ask me anything about this
planet at night,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] medicine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] or whatever,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] feel
free to do so anytime!
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Continue_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="8f26b1404f8043668085b6ea00a590b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Eheheh![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I like how curious you are.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="e75c9b50679e485783dab74185a56ac8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hey there, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're looking perky.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Maaaybe a little too perky.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Should I give
you a checkup?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f70dc207c7874c1f8c22d22b4df85e32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well, hello, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do me a favor.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't
pick strange things up off the ground and
eat them while you're out there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0a7d051d900143548396236b02cfb259" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]These areas have been approved for
night expeditions.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="0dae9575b4b14799a249132eba279167" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Where's our next adventure?
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="7802201411b9481eb48cc160ec6de089" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Come talk to me again when you're
ready,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
SV005.SV005_Area500_Talk_Outro_A02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="2"/][UE:Meta key="a091e685055b40eaa5b0d12f3062aeff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]See ya.
SV005.SV005_Takeoff_NightFirst:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="ce9d03ec457c45858582b9574ed3aaf6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Sunset's not quite here yet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] so you can
breathe easy for a little bit,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] eheheh.
